subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: After being harassed and bothered for the entire first half, Kalin Lucas delivered for Michigan State in the final minutes, helping the Spartans knock off the defending champions, the Kansas Jayhawks.
snippet: After being harassed and bothered for the entire first half, Kalin Lucas delivered for Michigan State in the final minutes, helping the Spartans knock off the defending champions, the Kansas Jayhawks.
